CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Classification__c , 'CSO Spares' ) , IF( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Place Order' ) , IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Order_Entered__c)) , IF( ROUND((Order_Entered__c - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=24, 'TRUE', 'FALSE') , IF( ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=24, '', 'FALSE')), IF( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Order Status' ), IF ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Denied') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Expired') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') , IF( ROUND((ClosedDate - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=72, 'TRUE', 'FALSE') , IF( ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=72, 'TRUE', 'FALSE')), IF( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Order Changes' ), IF ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Denied') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Expired') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') , IF( ROUND((ClosedDate - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=24, 'TRUE', 'FALSE') , IF( ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=24, 'TRUE', 'FALSE')), IF( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Quotes/Availability' ) , IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(Quote_Entered__c)) , IF( ROUND((Quote_Entered__c - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=48, 'TRUE', 'FALSE') , IF( ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate)*24,2) <=48, '', 'FALSE') ) , '') ) ) ) , '')
CustomField.label: InSLA
